name: Sons Of Midgard
description:
Description:

Sons of Midgard is a 2D Pixel Platformer. These Two Vikings will need to work together to get back to their home in Midgard.

Your goal is to get back to Midgard after dying and being sent to Helheim. You will have to work together to fight enemies and solve puzzles to traverse Helheim and get back to Midgard.

Features: 
  • Co-op Platformer 
  • Multiple Levels
  • Pixel Art Style
  • Multiple throwables (Axes, Spears, Hammers and Crates)
  • Archer and Melee Enemies
Controls:

Arne (Player 1)

  • WAD - Movement 
  • Tap E -  Interact, Pickup or Putdown
  • Hold E - To Throw

Ulf (Player 2) 

  • Arrows - Movement
  • Tap CTRL - Interact, Pickup or Putdown
  • Hold CTRL - To Throw

Defy the Gods, Death is not your end!
